1.title: Wave Rider

episode of.title: Fit Trip with Kimber Westphall (TV Series 2011–2012)

1.plot: Season Premiere: Join Kimber as she tries surfing...indoors. Will she be able to master the waves and stand up? Find out the season premiere of Fit Trip. Plus stay tuned for a sneak peak of the next episode, Cirque Kimber.

2.title: Cirque Kimber

episode of.title: Fit Trip with Kimber Westphall (TV Series 2011–2012)

2.plot: Kimber hates heights and spinning so why would she try a Cirque Fit Class? To prove if she can do it, so can you. Stay tuned for a sneak peak at episode 6, where Kimber tries fencing.

3.title: En Garde!

episode of.title: Fit Trip with Kimber Westphall (TV Series 2011–2012)

3.plot: Draw your sword. Kimber takes on a new form of fitness as she tries fencing with the Dallas fencing academy.

4.title: Beyond

episode of.title: Fit Trip with Kimber Westphall (TV Series 2011–2012)

4.plot: Kimber has a double dose of fun as she tries Pilates and cycling as Beyond studios in Dallas. Does she have what it takes to go beyond? Find out.

5.title: Psycho (Gym)

episode of.title: Fit Trip with Kimber Westphall (TV Series 2011–2012)

5.plot: Kimber takes fitness to the extreme as she tries the intense kettle bell workout of psycho gym.

1.title: Welcome to the Underworld

episode of.title: Fit Trip with Kimber Westphall (TV Series 2011–2012)

1.plot: Series Premiere: Join Kimber Westphall as she travels the country looking for the most innovative fitness trends. This week she travels to Texas to check out cross fit, but is in for a rough surprise...it's a sport. Can she compete? Plus check out a preview of episode 2: body juggling.

2.title: Mind, Body, Fear

episode of.title: Fit Trip with Kimber Westphall (TV Series 2011–2012)

2.plot: Join Kimber as she attempts to conquer not only the exotic art of body juggling, but master her fear of failure. Plus stay tuned for a sneak peek at episode 3 as Kimber checks out Hip Hop High Heels.

3.title: Heel It Up

episode of.title: Fit Trip with Kimber Westphall (TV Series 2011–2012)

3.plot: Join Kimber as she tries to master a hip hop class...in heels. Can she get the beat? Find out in episode 3 of "Fit Trip". Featured on Good Morning Texas.

imdb.title: Fit Trip with Kimber Westphall
akas: Fit Trip with Kimber Westphall (United States)
plot: Join host Kimber Westphall as she travels the country exploring the latest fitness trends.
